title: Disney's sluggish stock threatens to dent CEO Bob Iger's legacy
full_text:
Disney's sluggish stock threatens to dent CEO Bob Iger's legacy. Disney's stock is lagging despite CEO Bob Iger's comeback tour. Analysts broke down the reasons and the potential impact his successor could have.. Disney's stock is casting a shadow over CEO Bob Iger.Variety/Getty Images; Getty Images; Tyler Le/BI
